title: White House not planning new big trade initiative against China: official
text:
April 4, 2018 / 5:44 PM / Updated 43 minutes ago White House not planning new big trade initiative against China: official Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
WASHINGTON (Reuters) - President Donald Trumpâ€™s administration does not at this time have another new, big trade initiative planned against China and is focused on implementing the moves that have already been announced, a White House official said on Wednesday. 
The official said the administration was aware of the market reaction to the trade row with Beijing, but said economic fundamentals and long-term trends were more compelling to policymakers at the White House. Reporting by Jeff Mason, editing by G Crosse
